So here is how to get it,

1. Have Full version of Rome : Total War
2. Download this torrent
3. Mount disc in folder
4. Install expansion
5. Open the mounted drive
6. Open folder "Crack"
7. Copy the game and paste in where you installed Rome : Total War

Hope this helps and good luck! :D
